Girls Coding Kosova purpose is to encourage women to reach
full academic and professional potential in technical fields.


Find Out More

About

We are constantly working on bringing events to the young and enthusiasts women of Kosovo to encourage them to code, launch companies or work as developers in other exciting startups in the country.

TRAININGS

GCK organizes trainings in programming languages and latest technologies. They are mentored by professional individuals, highly regarded in their respective fields.

PROJECTS

Our projects goals are to create a better society, be it through reporting sexual harassment or visualizing procurement data from municipalities.

MEMBERS

Our network spans across all municipalities in Kosovo and includes over seven hundred (700) active young members aged between fifteen (15) and twenty-five (25).

FUTURE

Our vision is to create a free-of-gender-bias IT sector in Kosovo and the Balkan Region. If you have an idea that aligns with this goal, do not hesitate to contact us.

We love C O D I N G!
